text:
Here are a few caption options for the image of an orange tree:

**Option 1 (playful):**

> Orange you glad to see me?  🍊☀️

**Option 2 (simple & sweet):**

> Sunshine and sweet oranges.  What more could you ask for?


**Option 3 (a bit more descriptive):**

> A little slice of heaven.  These oranges are almost too pretty to eat (almost!).
